introduction

The Problem, The Solution

our Solution and their benefit

solution nobody else provide

100% of unrecycled organic waste from landfills

high temperature dissociate harmful compounds

unlock the calorific value of organic waste most efficiently

versatility to gasify household waste, plastics, paper/cardboard, tyres, wood and hydrocarbons

lower land use footprint

benefits nobody else provide

increase customer bottom line and extend life of landfils

cleaner generation of power from synthesis gas (H, CO, N)

sustainable renewable energy that is affordable and available

major contribution to the circular economy and sustainable development goals (UN)

80% more efficient use of land

How deep is Aussie market?

Each year australin produces 67 million tonnes per year*

total per year

= 67,000,000 tonnes

less all recycling and Re-use

-37,000,000 (includes shipping

less 2% energy

- 1,370,000

Net

= 28,630,000

How deep is the aussie market? Answer: This deep

6,700,000 tonnes per year of organnic waste to landfil**

+ 3,500,000 tonnes plastic to landfill

+ 2,160,000 tonnes per year paper/cardboard to landfill

= 12,360,000 tonnes per year available for MSW plasma gasification waste to energy

LEP waste to energy has the potential to raise percentage of waste to energy from 2% to 20% countrywided

beyond australia to the global market

simply plastic

as of 2018 the estimated tonnage worldwide in plastic waste was 8,300,000,000 tonnes, and only 12% was destroyed by enviromentally unsound thermal processes ( incineration, chain, grate, etc.)

the rest went to landfill and the oceans of the world and takes on average 40 years to degrade

there is a clear demand for a diffrent solution offering efficient waste to energy: councils, governments, private, landfills and commercial/ industrial customers anbound in Australia and globally

What else is there to say except someone spent 41.6% more for much less

Why are we the best solution for waste to energy?

Much higher Steady State high temperature operations ensure maximum energy recovery from organic wastes

Parasitic load is very manageable @ +/- 22%

Versatility is built into the system: household organic waste, plastics, wood products, paper and cardboard, hospital/medical waste and tyres have all been tested and proven

Greenhouse gases are reduced (no methane and very low CO2 from burning synthesis gas in power generation prime movers) with very low toxic emissions compared with all other technologies

Synthesis gas is hydrogen, carbon monoxide and some nitrogen

Let’s be clear about innovation!

LEP Waste to Energy Pty Ltd is NOT the plasma technology Owner – but we are INNOVATORS...and have exclusive rights to the use of specific plasma technology in Australia with pre-emptive rights elsewhere

Our INNOVATION, after years of investment and research, is to assemble existing plasma and other technologies into a unique equipment and commercial platform and we possess invaluable know-how and intrinsic value, recognized by our internal and external team members

What do you get for early stage investing?

A preferred return and upside in valuation of the company Equity IRR @ 18-20%

The world is inundated with organic wastes, on land and at sea, and with greenhouse gases in the air. Our energy is from a renewable source with excellent technology and the time is right

Two Points of Strategic Impact (for Investors)

The operation of our first project at Newcastle, NSW will establish world best practices for waste to energy

We will enjoy performance-based exclusivity in the Aussie marketand other select markets for the plasma equipment usage in waste to energy projects
